name: clean-old-files
description: Cleans old files based on path, age, and extensions.

args.name: -Path
args.description: The folder path to clean. Defaults to the current directory if not provided.

args.name: -Months
args.description: The minimum age of files to delete, in months. Defaults to 12.

args.name: -Extensions
args.description: A comma-separated list of file extensions to clean (e.g., "txt,log"). Defaults to "txt,log".

args.name: -AutoDelete
args.description: Skips the confirmation prompt and deletes files automatically.
